title: Login Issue
description: User is unable to log in even with correct username and password, blocking account access completely.

title: Page Loading Slow
description: The dashboard page takes unusually long time to load, causing frustration and delaying daily tasks badly.

title: Error 500 on Checkout
description: A server error 500 consistently appears whenever customers attempt checkout, preventing any order completion.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Password reset emails are not being sent properly, leaving customers unable to change their login details.

title: UI Bug on Mobile
description: Buttons overlap on smaller mobile screens, making navigation difficult and reducing usability for mobile users.

title: Notification Not Sent
description: System notifications are failing to reach users, resulting in missed updates and lack of important alerts.

title: Incorrect Invoice Total
description: Invoices generated by system show wrong totals, leading to customer complaints and billing mismatches daily.

title: Search Feature Not Working
description: Search function shows no results despite data availability, making it hard for users to find information.

title: Profile Picture Upload Fails
description: Profile picture uploads consistently fail with error messages, preventing users from updating their accounts.

title: Email Verification Broken
description: Verification emails lead to broken 404 links, stopping users from activating accounts after registration process.

title: Settings Page Crash
description: Whenever users try saving changes on settings page, the system crashes and all modifications are lost.

title: Payment Gateway Timeout
description: Payments fail due to gateway timeout errors, leaving customers complete purchases on platform.
